name: SENGOKU II
description: Return to the mystical battle worlds. Re-enter the nightmare that never seems to end. The great confrontation with the demonic warlord in the Demon Castle should mean the end, but the war has just begun... The Demon Castle looms high above the land and the Sovereign of Darkness commands the towering fortress. The legendary samurai warriors are summoned again. Now, they must travel through time, but with newfound experience and powers. Fight with more attack techniques, new power-ups, more magic, and transform into one of four identities as you battle through this action-fighting, monster of sequels, SENGOKU II.
